[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/constants/addresses.rs] [Function: aptos_test_root_address()] [Network detection] Is there proper detection to prevent the test root address from being used on mainnet, or could a misconfiguration allow test code paths with this privileged address to execute on production networks? [File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/constants/addresses.rs] [Function: aptos_test_root_address()] [Access control bypass] Do all system functions that use aptos_test_root_address() properly validate that they're running in a test environment, or can production code accidentally grant special privileges to this address?
